summary: Dean Karnazes also known as the UltraMarathon Man has inspired thousands of runners. This is the epilogue to Karnazes' 50 day expedition. Dean Karnazes completed 50 Marathons in 50 States ... See full summary »
cast: Alexandria Karnazes|Dean Karnazes|Fran Karnazes|Julie Karnazes|Nicholas Karnazes
title: Ultramarathon Man: 50 Marathons, 50 States, 50 Days
